website_summaries.verdict: Inviting, warm, and sized comfortably for a family of 4.
pros: 18-inch wide seats provide a comfortable environment for dining
Soft finishing touches invoke an easygoing start to any day
We love the two-tone finish and details in the chair design as well

customer_reviews.title: No finish on the table top or chair seats.
customer_reviews.text: First of all it is quite sturdy once properly assembled. But there is no finish on the table top or the chair seats. The wood has been stained but not protected with any finish. So, to protect the table top against spills or stains you will either have to sand and coat the table top with several coats of polyurethane or apply paste wax. Another issue is that the table legs are not positioned exactly at the corners. Thus narrowing the seating space on the long sides of the table making it impossible to have more than one chair on the long sides. But still not a bad dining set. Just think carefully about your needs before choosing this product.
customer_reviews.author: ticked off

customer_reviews.title: Great little table for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Great little table for a small space. Delivery was earlier than expected which was great and putting together wasn’t hard at all. Very sturdy and doesn’t feel flimsy. Overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality dinning set!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around a lot of the local furniture stores before settling on this one...the package was heavy (thank goodness it was delivered to my front door). I would have struggled moving it with a dolley (I recommend two people two move box). Once I got the package into my condo, I inspected the package and it appeared to be in good shape. I was able to put the dinning set together by myself and I’m sure it took about 1-2 hours. It’s sturdy and highly attractive...this was my first time ordering furniture online and I’m not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 671Guahan

customer_reviews.title: Two of the chairs were already damaged when I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of the chairs were already damaged when I opened the package today. Tried to contact the seller, wish they'll solve the problem ASAP. The table is ok, but the chairs are cheaply made and not stable at all. You'll need chair pads because the chairs top are not smooth and they even have thorns on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Very annoyed right now. The chairs are missing threads for the screws to grip and one of the seats has fallen off already. All of the screws fell out on the floor and my two-year-old found them. I’ve called the customer care number four times and it’s goes to a voicemail. UPDATED: do not call the customer care number for Ashley furniture just call this number, 888-280-4331 and Amazon will take care of you. Thank you Amazon! I can always count on them to make it right. This makes me much happier! Because honestly, the table is perfect and really cute. It looks great in our house!
customer_reviews.author: emw

customer_reviews.title: Dents and Dings - INSPECT BEFORE UNPACKING
customer_reviews.text: Despite the very through packaging of this dining set, there were chunks missing from the seats of multiple chairs and a couple of the table legs were scratched among other minor damage issues. For me personally, it wasn't worth the trouble of packing everything up again to send it back for an exchange or refund. Be warned, the good price does come with strings attached, you may find some damaged pieces. Overall I'm moderately happy, the table is right size and style, it is sturdy enough and will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table for the price. But as they say you get what you pay for. The table and chairs showed up with a decent amount of scuffs, mainly on the wooden tops and one even had what looks like a razor blade cut on it. Chairs themselves went together easily. While they are very sturdy, only one of the 3 was level when set on the floor. The table was level and sturdy once put together. The only negatives on it were the scuffs on the edges and top, and one of the threads in the legs came out when screwing the bolt in. I just tapped it back in and didn't tighten it to much.
customer_reviews.author: mb1134

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made and very cheap material. Two chairs arrived damaged, which Amazon compensated me for. However, I still cannot use it as the screws don’t fit the holes for the table at all. Seems they are too narrow. This is completely useless to me now. I will be tossing my new table in chairs rather than my old set as planned.
customer_reviews.author: salegirl

customer_reviews.title: Really nice !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to complete my kitchen. It went really well with the awesome island that I purchased on amazon a few months ago. This set is above and beyond my expectations. Sturdy, easy to put together and wound up making the kitchen finally warm and inviting and kitchen like , like a home should be. Very happy with this purchase. I plan on hanging a really nice chandelier low over it to make it even more spectacular. Thanks Ashley and amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Unfinished wood kind of sucks
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken slightly broken chair. Quality is a mix. The white parts are of good quality. The unfinished wood seems like the quality of wood is questionable, the wood splinters on the edge of the chairs. Also the unsealed top can lead to color changed if something is spilled on there. Also one of the chairs seats doesnt screw in. All of the seats came pre screwed but one was loose. So I grabbed a screw driver but the screw wouldnt hold like they messed up at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Well made and exactly what the advertisement said it was. I love it! Real wood not imitation like a lot that is being sold.
customer_reviews.author: cora gaumont

customer_reviews.title: Need a good looking table with a small budget- this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and basic set for the price. It would have been nice to come with cushions- I tried to buy separately but they didn’t fit the seat perfectly so they ended up being uncomfortable and removed. I listened to other reviewer and purchased the finishing wax for the wood- it worked perfectly. For the price I didn’t mind the extra effort to finish the table top and chairs. Though delivery box was big, putting it together was easy enough. Overall it will meet my needs and I would recommend this to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right up there in QUALITY  with  JUNK.....
customer_reviews.text: Words can not express the utter disgust I have for this company and this product. Thanks for wasting my time and effort on a RUINED PRODUCT you sent me. Someone is asleep at the wheel at ____________FURNITURE COMPANY.....
customer_reviews.author: Freddie P. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This set is clearly a joke. All 4 of my chairs came damaged and broken on the sides. The box it came in was not damaged so I’m assuming this was courtesy of the manufacturer. Not quite sure where the quality control is at? Don’t waste your time clearly reviews show this is an issue amongst others.
customer_reviews.author: Ilda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice- daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Well dad scored big points from his daughter getting this well built sturdy set for her. In addition to the strength, the color works well for most any decor & is small enough to fit in an apartment DR. I'm pretty picking but the build on this was more than expected. Also discovered huge price differences from stores & retailers.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set, perfect for my small one bedroom apartment. I put it together myself in less than two hours! Only complaint is that some of the chairs are wobbly- that might be my mistake though, and I don’t mind buying pads to stop the wobble.
customer_reviews.author: esteshm

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous kitchen set but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous kitchen table and chairs however the sturdiness of the chairs are not that great. There is a piece on each chair that needs to be put on the back. When sitting in the chair (under 200lb person) the back piece fell off, and without this piece, the chair is not sturdy if you are sitting back. I'm bummed about this and hope that this doesn't happen to the other 3 chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi D.

customer_reviews.title: Great table but slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table especially for the price. Unfortunately, like others mentioned some pieces were damaged during manufacturing. Package was delivered incredibly quickly but it’s very large and heavy so can be a bit difficult getting inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broken, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Entire table is cheaply made and delivered in poor condition. One chair was completely decimated upon arrival. We’ve been waiting. Moth for the replacement, still nothing. Table top seems unfinished and scratches extremely easily. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Mess Express

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Had a few problems. First it arrived with two broken chairs, they sent a second replacement and two of those chairs were broken as well. Had to deal with amazon on the phone continuously regarding it. But after all the hassle I love the table, it was definitely worth all the drama and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made for an Ashley Signature product
customer_reviews.text: The product says it will come in with 5 boxes, it came in one. When we opened it the table top was damaged along with 2 damaged chairs, they sent me a replacement set and again we got 2 damaged chairs. Poorly packed and quality of being an Ashley Signature set was very poor. We were able to get 1 set out of 2 sets. Would never buy again. The second set we were told by an Amazon rep that it would be in 5 boxes, again everything in 1 box.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy jansson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with quality and looks of the table
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs came in two days 184 pounds I did not believe it when FedEx delivered it my husband put it together rather quickly and it is beautiful!!!! I would suggest people buying it it is very good quality and very sturdy chairs in the table is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: caryn byerson

customer_reviews.title: Make an immediate and close inspection
customer_reviews.text: The set is beautiful. We ordered it just before a Florida hurricane. Had I defect in a chair but it became too onerous to exchange the set. I was able to fix the chair. The set looks great
customer_reviews.author: Lewisl

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good, not great. Inexpensive, decent appearance/finish for the money. Assembly takes a bit of time and attention, some pieces were slightly “off” and would only fit with each other like a puzzle. Minor dings/scrapes produced a small refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy about the quality
customer_reviews.text: I was worried to buy this set after reading some of the reviews but my husband likes the design. I decided to take a risk and bought it anyways. I am very happy about the quality. Solid wood and nice details. Worth the money. The delivery took a longer than the expected time but we are not in a hurry to get it so it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. My only complaint is that the wood used for the top of the table has a strong odor, especially after wiping it down ....it smells like urine! Still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: SailorEve1112

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Table at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this table was to put together. The only issue I had was moving it upstairs to our apartment because the boxes it came in were extremely heavy and awkward. Once we got it put together it looks great and seems very sturdy and high quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: William Taggart

customer_reviews.title: The table and chairs are nice, but hardware for one of the chairs was ...
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs are nice, but hardware for one of the chairs was not included and even though I was told by Ashley customer support that they would send replacement hardware it still hasn't shown up 10 days later. Additionally, after dealing with customer service I realized that one of the chairs has a chip it it. I'm not going to go through the pain to return it but it's disappointing. I love this set and if not for these issues I would have given it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Love this set and it is exactly the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown and received promptly. Love this set and it is exactly the same as it is in the Ashley Furniture showroom. The only difference is that you have to spend a couple hours putting it together, but it is very simple. Was worth it to save so much money.
customer_reviews.author: cslann

customer_reviews.title: Good table but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking table but i think it is overpriced for a ashley furniture. The table is not sturdy and a little wobbly..the chairs are easy to brake as i stood on 1 and it cracked causing my foot almost to go through the chair. It is easy to dirty and stain so have to keep it clean as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a cracked table leg, and 2 broken chairs. Not a good set at all. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: The seats were made of plywood and two of them broke within the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price range
customer_reviews.text: This a really sweet little table and chairs set. It was the nicest set within the price range and after putting it together I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Pottle

customer_reviews.title: part of the seat on a couple of the chairs were damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and it is very sturdy. I called because a couple chair seats were damaged and tried to get a replacement and no replacement order was put in, that was a week ago and called back and talked to very nice lady and she gave me options and offered me a 20% refund which I took so I didn't have to send it all back. Customer service is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: this is a beautiful table. It is very sturdy and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price and design, this is a beautiful table. It is very sturdy and is very good quality. The table is easy to put together but the chairs take some time. The two stars are for the fact that when received, one of the chairs was completely damaged and unusable. There are also cracks in some of the paint on the other chairs. This is most likely from shipping, but regardless, I still only have a table with 3 chairs. I am trying to get it replaced, but it is still a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: You pay what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces missing and little parts broken. In general a cheap table set but does the work. You pay what you get I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The wood is not real. The pre- assembled screws fall out of it. I have only had this table for 3 or 4 months. The chair seats started coming off.
customer_reviews.author: mrinal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Table set arrived with broken chair parts. I wanted to simply change out the chairs that were broken, but they require you to return the entire set. Chairs are particle board and poorly manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: nice but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Great value, but the chairs wobble. I guess it is to be expected given the price, and it's a fairly easy fix, but the best I can do is 3 stars when something comes out of the box with a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: A. Halfstar

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: One chair seat had damage on the front edge, but had already put everything together so not going to disassemble to return. The table top feels like it will flake off, like it needs a sealer on it or something; kinda disappointed in it but it will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: LeighAnn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, one piece table top
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, one piece table top, easy to assemble' can stain wood as you prefer or leave natural look. fast delivery' all pieces -screws in box, hassle free and very nice look, should last for a long while!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Montoya

customer_reviews.title: They added a weird treatment to it that makes the top of the wood look like a faux plastic finish
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised by the quality and sturdiness of this set. They added a weird treatment to it that makes the top of the wood look like a faux plastic finish, but if you look underneath you can see that it's real, solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love this dinning set
customer_reviews.text: Love this dinning set! Easy to put together and very sturdy. Box was delivered a little torn up so was missing hardware for a chair. I called amazon and they were willing to ship while new set but instead they gave me a credit and I will go buy the screws myself. Still 5 stars for the set itself!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality wood (no particle board
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality wood (no particle board!). Mostly easy to assemble as long as you have an electric screwdriver. Some of the holes were slightly too small for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Tre M

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality. I had to give one star so I could submit this review, otherwise, I would gave it none. I really do not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Essa Imhmed

customer_reviews.title: Awsome table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table. The stuffiness and the assembly are top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: James McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by how good the quality is on this set, everything feels very sturdy and looks nice. Definitely recommended for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: These are defective pieces. I ordered this once from Amazon and again from Ashley directly. In both cases I was sent furniture with at least one piece completely broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with great quality table. Was a bit intimidated by the assembly but I did it with no issues and pride in that task makes the table even more valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Tell

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for an attractive table
customer_reviews.text: The shipping alone should have been $300.00. Great deal for an attractive table. No, it's not homemade Amish furniture, but for those who want an appealing table for a price cheaper than some garage sale tables, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: jdc

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product was damaged. I had to use wood glue to glue the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: victoria Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although the box came mangled with a lot of tape, this table is beautiful. Everything was well packed. The table is easy to put together and worth every penny. I would highly recommend if you’re in the market for a kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS SET. It came broken, scuffed, and literally thrown in the box as if a tornado itself packaged the item. Sent back immediately
customer_reviews.author: Alex French

customer_reviews.title: The table is absolutely beautiful and first time I’ve spent over 400 on a ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is absolutely beautiful and first time I’ve spent over 400 on a table, however disappointed with some marks on it.. we already have it together and would hate to pack it back up and ship it out..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, and so easy to put together. It is a wonderful table for an eat-in kitchen. I love the design on the chairs. I was concerned the wood color would clash with our dark hardwood floors, but it looks great together. All the tools you need come with the box too, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly E

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: table is fine but chairs are falling apart. Literally screws are just falling out of the bottom of the chair. So upsetting. Should have gone to a furniture store
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, really great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful and really high quality. Very sturdy and lovely colors!
customer_reviews.author: Fawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall the set is very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Overall the set is very nice and sturdy. One cushion was torn open. It was taken care of and we are very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my own personal use and is exactly what I wanted. It fit perfect and was very easy to put together. Was shipped quickly and on perfect condition. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hammermeister

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this table it very sturdy chairs and table top are not solid wood thin layer of wood wrapped two chairs were chipped when I got them kept them anyways looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are cracks in the chairs and the product is not good as it looks in the
customer_reviews.text: Not upto our expectations. There are cracks in the chairs and the product is not good as it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Anand S.

customer_reviews.title: a deal
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our daughters first house, she was thrilled, money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: SirTerrence

customer_reviews.title: Cute table for small space
customer_reviews.text: The table was perfect and exactly what we were looking for. Just wished it was packaged a little better because on the the seat corners was all scuffed up and not a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: melinda pacitti

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but seat was damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the seats was damaged when we opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Bad material
customer_reviews.text: Broken parts I ordered three consecutive times and all of them came broken
customer_reviews.author: Pipenavar

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I added a Charm Status in my kitchen!!! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels sturdy with a touch of warmth in my kitchen!!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is bad
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product when I bought as it looks great but after one month all chairs became very shaky and easy to get damaged. The wood is not real
customer_reviews.author: Rasha Elmahdi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table for the price. Solid wood and sturdy. Looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Regan W

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fits. None of the legs fit into the table I will be cutting it to make it fit but don’t bury this piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged upon receiving it. Chair seat had a chip in it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table however the seat bottoms was damaged when it arrived. I am very disappointed that we spent so much money on something for our wedding that was already damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! So cute and versatile, such a good deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: ashley green

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It took my husband and I about 30 minutes to put together, but it’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Willey

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful. Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: i actually love how it came out ! just one chair was missing screws and i had to go out a buy a few things to secure the chair properly. But other then that i love it !
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautiful!! Get your drill out and it goes together very quickly. Love it in my small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: debra burzese

customer_reviews.title: All components arrived damage.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is bad very bad, the finish of the product is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: One table leg came cracked some which is why I gave 4 stars, but overall it functions well and is super cute for our space!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lasco

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials used
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love This table but the underneath side of most chairs is peeling. I would have loved to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: I recently unbox this and found defects with the product ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently unbox this and found defects with the product. Joints are not proper, there scratches on the chairs support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very solid
customer_reviews.text: This table is gorgeous! Exactly what I was looking for when I purchased a table for my small dining area. Easy to put together and very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. The size is perfect for a small dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Wally F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dining set
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and looks great. Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE WAGNER

customer_reviews.title: Big box gets delivered to home .. don't let that get to you.
customer_reviews.text: I got a good looking table for a good price !! Was easy to put together.. even for me ;-)
customer_reviews.author: david buckley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this table. Amazing quality for the price and its absolutely gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dining room set and perfect for our small dining ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dining room set and perfect for our small dining space. Very solidly constructed (weighs 140 lbs) and all wood. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great must buy.
customer_reviews.text: It looked amazing. Nothing broken all parts in box. Easy to build one person job.
customer_reviews.author: jessica carlos

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley Brovada Dining Room Table and Chairs (Set of 5), Two-tone
product_meta.description:
Color:Two-tone

Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Brovada Rectangular 5-Piece Dining Room Set - Includes Table & 4 Chairs - Two-tone Finish.

Additional Dimensions:

Table Width: 36.75 Inches
Table Depth: 48.38 Inches
Table Height: 30.25 Inches
Chair (4) Width: 17.88 Inches
Chair (4) Depth: 22.00 Inches
Chair (4) Height: 39.25 Inches
Apron to floor: 27.13 Inches
Seat height: 18.13 Inches
Seat width: 17.88 Inches
Seat depth: 17.63 Inches
feature_bullets: DINING TABLE AND CHAIRS SET: Bring a light airy feel to your eat-in kitchen space or dining room with this crisp design. This contemporary dinner table is great for apartment living or small families
HANDSOMELY CRAFTED: This set is made of wood and engineered wood. Table top and chair seats are finished with a brushed texture in a light wash finish
TWO-TONE DESIGN: This set is so easy to match with its white and light wood hues. The two-tone color scheme and lattice-back chairs keep the look current
5-PIECE DINING SET: Rectangular table measures 36" W x 48" D x 30" H and each chair measures 18" W x 23.25" D x 39" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars146 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
